pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena devadatto saṅghabhedāya parakkamati cakkabhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.5_0: Kathañhi nāma devadatto saṅghabhedāya parakkamissati cakkabhedāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.6_1: kokāliko kaṭamodakatissako khaṇḍadeviyā putto samuddadatto te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.9_0: Amhākañca devadatto chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati jānāti no bhāsati amhākampetaṁ khamatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.10_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.11_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā bhavissanti vaggavādakā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.12_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anuvattake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.13_1: bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā honti vaggavādakā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.16_1: moghapurisā devadattassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā bhavissanti vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.19.1_0: “Tasseva kho pana bhikkhussa bhikkhū honti anuvattakā vaggavādakā eko vā dve vā tayo vā. Te evaṁ vadeyyuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.21_0: Dhammavādī ceso bhikkhu, vinayavādī ceso bhikkhu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.22_0: Amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati jānāti no bhāsati amhākampetaṁ khamatī’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.25_0: na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.27_1: samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.28_0: Evañca te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.28_1: te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.29_0: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyyuṁ, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.6_0: yaṁdiṭṭhiko so hoti yaṅkhantiko yaṁruciko tepi taṁdiṭṭhikā honti taṅkhantikā taṁrucikā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.9_0: Eko vā dve vā tayo vāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.10_0: eko vā hoti dve vā tayo vā. Te evaṁ vadeyyuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.11_0: “māyasmanto etaṁ bhikkhuṁ kiñci avacuttha, dhammavādī ceso bhikkhu, vinayavādī ceso bhikkhu,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.12_0: amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati jānāti no bhāsati amhākampetaṁ khamatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.16_1: Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.18_0: Na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.21_0: Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.29_0: Na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.32_0: Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.41_0: Itthannāmo ca itthanāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.43_1: saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.46_0: Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.48_0: Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.49_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṁ samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.54_0: Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.56_0: Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.57_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṁ samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.59_0: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.2_0: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
